amendatorysection.catchline: Search warrant; issuance; original statement lost, destroyed, or unintelligible; effect.
amendatorysection.para: If the original of the oral or telephonic statement, taken pursuant to section 29-814.02 or 29-814.03, shall be lost, destroyed, or a critical portion thereof is unintelligible, a search warrant issued pursuant to such oral or telephonic statement shall be deemed to be invalid.
